article:
'Richard "Rich" Cho' (born August 10, 1965) is the general manager of the
Charlotte Bobcats of the National Basketball Association. Prior to the Bobcats,
Cho was the general manager of the Portland Trail Blazers and the assistant
general manager of the Oklahoma City Thunder. {{cite press
release |url=http://www.iamatrailblazersfan.com/PressReleaseDisplay/tabid/297/i-
temId/1607/Default.aspx |title=Trail Blazers name Cho General Manager
|publisher=Portland Trail Blazers |date=July 19, 2010 |accessdate=July 19, 2010
}} Cho is the first Asian American general manager in NBA history. {{cite news |url=http://nba.fanhouse.com/2010/07/19/portland-trail-blazers-name-rich-cho-
general-manager/?synd=1 |title=Portland Trail Blazers Name Rich Cho General
Manager |publisher=Fanhouse.com |last=Ziller |first=Tom |date=July 19, 2010
|accessdate=July 19, 2010 }} {{cite news |url=http://blog.-
oregonlive.com/behindblazersbeat/2010/07/new_general_manager_rich_cho_h.html
|title=New general manager Rich Cho had the answers the Blazers wanted in his
backpack |work=The Oregonian |last=Quick |first=Jason |date=July 20, 2010
|accessdate=July 20, 2010 }}
categories: Burmese emigrants to the United States
Pepperdine University School of Law alumni
